results.deck: Examu and Nitroplus team up to release a hi-res 2D fighting game based on Nitroplus' visual novels.
results.name: Nitroplus Blasterz: Heroines Infinite Duel

results.deck: A narrative game by bracket games.
results.name: Three Fourths Home

results.deck: A runner with mechanics based around color.
results.name: Color Guardians

results.deck: The Naruto series jumps to eighth generation consoles with the fourth sequential installment of the Ultimate Ninja Storm series.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4

results.deck: A four player co-op brawler staring undead vikings.
results.name: Zombie Vikings

results.deck: A 3D fantasy lane defense game, where the player controls a wizard trying to defend the kingdom against the invading Krinkles.
results.name: Krinkle Krusher

results.deck: A 3D tag-team fighting game based on the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.
results.name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Eyes of Heaven

results.deck: An expanded version of Deception IV, with additional modes and new playable characters.
results.name: Deception IV: The Nightmare Princess

results.deck: Ubisoft brings Risk to current gen consoles with a fancy high-tech war room front end.
results.name: Risk

results.deck: An 8 episode adventure game series set in the Minecraft world.
results.name: Minecraft: Story Mode

results.deck: A rallycross racing game where the player competes for a place on rally champion Sébastien Loeb's team.
results.name: Sébastien Loeb Rally Evo

results.deck: Fly around a maze in this 1985 arcade release from UPL.
results.name: Raiders5

results.deck: Kill Strain is a top-down, 5-on-5 shooter project from Sony Computer Entertainment. Two teams of five humans compete to gather resources — and rack up kills — while a third team of mutants battles both teams in an attempt to spread their infection and add humans to their mutant ranks.
results.name: Kill Strain

results.deck: A reimaging of Falcom's classic action RPG franchise that takes place in modern-day Tokyo instead of the usual fantasy setting the series is known for.
results.name: Tokyo Xanadu

results.deck: A remastering of Capcom's fourth Devil May Cry game featuring 3 additional playable characters, enhanced graphics and balance tweaks.
results.name: Devil May Cry 4: Special Edition

results.deck: Standpoint is a gravity shifting, first-person puzzle platformer exploring themes of Grief.
results.name: Standpoint

results.deck: The Shonen Jump crossover fighter J-Stars Victory Vs gets an expanded, international release on PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, and PlayStation 4.
results.name: J-Stars Victory Vs+

results.deck: A platformer starring a funky Perseus as he sets out to defeat Music Titans.
results.name: Funk of Titans

results.deck: Jotun is an hand-drawn action exploration game set in Norse mythology.
results.name: Jotun

results.deck: Join Zheros squad and fight your way through the twisted forces that threaten the universe in this beat 'em up developed by Rimlight Studios.
results.name: Zheros

results.deck: A turn-based tactical space combat game developed by Escape Hatch Entertainment.
results.name: Starlight Tactics

results.deck: An upcoming video game from Big Ant Studios, makers of Don Bradman Cricket. The game will feature official teams from the NRL, Super league and all accompanying lower leagues.
results.name: Rugby League Live 3

results.deck: A Unreal 4 Engine survival horror game where you witness aliens carrying out their invasion.
results.name: The Hum

results.deck: A Unreal Engine 4 FPS horror game inspired by true events known as the "Dyatlov Pass Incident" where Russian students died unexpectedly in the northern Ural Mountains.
results.name: Kholat

results.deck: A compilation containing Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army 1 and 2, plus the previously unreleased Zombie Army 3.
results.name: Zombie Army Trilogy

results.deck: A remake of the 1996 sci-fi visual novel being developed by 5pb.
results.name: Yu-No: Kono Yo no Hate de Koi o Utau Shoujo

results.deck: A single player/ local co-op puzzle platformer developed by Rock Pocket Games and published by Sierra.
results.name: Shiftlings

results.deck: A horror action-RPG developed by Dontnod Entertainment. In Vampyr the player takes control of a vampiric doctor in the time period following World War I.
results.name: Vampyr

results.deck: An enhanced remaster of Borderlands 2 and Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel for PS4 and Xbox One including a new 4-player splitscreen mode for consoles.
results.name: Borderlands: The Handsome Collection

results.deck: An enhanced version of hack n' slash title Sengoku Basara 4, with new characters and a PS4 version.
results.name: Sengoku Basara 4 Sumeragi

results.deck: A physics puzzle game where the player tries to guide a rolling square with extendable sides through hazardous environments.
results.name: TorqueL

results.deck: A procedurally generated action RPG about resource gathering, rebuilding a lost world with terraforming powers, creating new islands and fighting off evil forces. Developed by former Ubisoft veterans.
results.name: Izle

results.deck: A puzzle game where different building blocks must be used to deliver blocks in a specific shape to a location.
results.name: Infinifactory

results.deck: Grow Home is a climbing game starring B.U.D. (a Botanical Utility Droid) who is researching the elusive Star plant & helping it bloom.
results.name: Grow Home

results.deck: A Free 2 Play online full open world game for the PS3, PS4 and PC.
results.name: Dragon's Dogma Online

results.deck: Like Continuum Shift before it, BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma receives an "Extend" version, increasing the character count, developing further storylines, tweaking balance, and more.
results.name: BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma Extend

results.deck: Lego Avengers is a Lego game based on the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

results.deck: A gem-matching game from the creators of Puzzle Quest.

results.deck: Battle it out sumo-style in this 1984 arcade release from Technos
results.name: Shusse Ozumo

results.deck: A PlayStation 4 and Xbox One re-release of the Ninja Theory-developed DmC Devil May Cry, complete with new modes, difficulty levels, costumes, and gameplay tweaks.

results.deck: The creator of Wonder Boy and Monster World is collaborating on a new follow-up for PC and consoles.
results.name: Monster Boy and the Wizard of Booze

results.deck: Spelunker World is a free-to-play iteration of the infamous cave exploration series for 1-6 online players.
results.name: Spelunker World

results.deck: The game, based on the movie, based on the game.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank

results.deck: Set 40 years after the events of Black Ops II, the twelfth installment of the Call of Duty series brings advanced robotics and biotic augmentations to the clandestine operations of the Black Ops storyline.
results.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III

results.deck: A Left 4 Dead style co-op game, set in the Warhammer universe.
results.name: Warhammer: End Times – Vermintide

results.deck: "Analog" themed exploration game, where the player scours various locations for old cassette tapes.
results.name: Small Radios Big Televisions

results.deck: The Stardust series enters the next generation.
results.name: Super Stardust Ultra

results.deck: A dungeon delve currently in development by Harebrained Schemes.
results.name: Necropolis

results.deck: Kromaia is a frantic 3D 6DOF action game placed in a strange, psychedelic and hostile universe governed by rules to be discovered by the player. A renewal of the classic coin-op shoot'em-ups featuring an open world in which to face hordes of enemies showing an adaptative AI that creates a delightful and unique experience.
results.name: Kromaia

results.deck: MLB's very own baseball franchise is returning for a second year with a handful of new features.
results.name: R.B.I. Baseball 2015

results.deck: In the style of the classic Baldur's Gate games, Sword Coast Legends is an all new D&D-licensed party-based RPG set in the Forgotten Realms campaign setting.
results.name: Sword Coast Legends

results.deck: A two player local co-op game where one player plays a paparazzi on the prowl, while the other a celebrity trying to avoid being photographed.
results.name: Paparazzi

results.deck: A Trivial Pursuit video game from Ubisoft and the Hasbro Channel.
results.name: Trivial Pursuit Live!

results.deck: A third person, episodic, action adventure in which the player takes control of two unlikely friends.
results.name: Troll and I

results.deck: The first expansion pack for Final Fantasy XIV, featuring new areas, jobs, flying mounts, player race and more.
results.name: Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward

results.deck: A vertical-scrolling action roguelike that is heavily inspired by Spelunky.
results.name: Downwell

results.deck: Create your own modes and options in this dual-joystick shooter from Blazing Badger.
results.name: AIPD: Artificial Intelligence Police Department

results.deck: The makers of Pure Pool are bringing unprecedented levels of purity to the poker table.
results.name: Pure Hold'em

results.deck: Mutant Football League is a spiritual successor to EA's Mutant League Football.
results.name: Mutant Football League

results.deck: Boot Hill Heroes 2 continues the adventures of Kid, Doc, Moon, and Rosy in this wild west RPG setting.
results.name: Boot Hill Heroes 2

results.deck: A game about being trapped in an ancient, half-submerged city.
results.name: Submerged

results.deck:
Hunger is a 2.5D "suspense adventure" game from Tarsier Studios. It stars a young girl attempting to make her way through an underwater labyrinth filled with monsters.

The art and gameplay take cues from Tarsier's previous project, LittleBigPlanet Vita. However, the story, world, and themes of the game are entirely unique.
results.name: Hunger

results.deck: Super Rude Bear Resurrection is a masocore platformer, but the corpses that are left behind can be used to make the game easier.
results.name: Super Rude Bear Resurrection

results.deck: A fast, arcade style cricket game that is based off the popular Tabletop game Test Match.
results.name: Tabletop Cricket

results.deck: An off-road kart racer developed by Vector Unit.
results.name: Beach Buggy Racing

results.deck: As a cube, players must quickly navigate a tunnel laden with obstacles.
results.name: Velocibox

results.deck: The Legend of Kay: Anniversary is an HD remastering of the 2005 Zeldalike, starring a feline warrior named Kay who must defend his peaceful home kingdom from an invading army of vicious primates.
results.name: Legend of Kay Anniversary

results.deck: A multiplayer stealth backstabbing adventure by Glass Knuckle Games.
results.name: Thief Town

results.deck: The sequel to the 2011 Japanese on-rails shooter developed by Inti Creates for the PlayStation Vita and PlayStation 4.
results.name: Gal Gun: Double Peace

results.name: Aces of the Luftwaffe

results.deck: Fast paced action game staring a lagomorphic ninja.
results.name: Ninjin: Clash of Carrots

results.deck: An indie action puzzle game.
results.name: Soft Body

results.deck: Play as a cyborg soldier in this side-scrolling action title from Supressive Fire Games.
results.name: Blood Alloy: Reborn

results.deck: The sequel to 2009's Afro Samurai was considered so unfinished and poorly done that it was pulled from digital distributors less than two months after its release, and all purchases were refunded.
results.name: Afro Samurai 2: Revenge of Kuma

results.deck: React Games presents Super Dungeon Bros, a frantic 1-4 players co-op endless roguelike action RPG.

results.deck: A game about a blind 10 year-old girl who is looking for her pet cat. Developed by Tiger & Squid and published by Team 17.

results.deck: A stand-alone prequel to Wolfenstein: The New Order developed by MachineGames for the PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4.
results.name: Wolfenstein: The Old Blood

results.deck: An instalment of the band-focused rhythm game for the Xbox One and PlayStation 4. Focusing on the core vocals, drums, guitar, and bass instruments, Rock Band 4 offers a new set of on-disc songs while supporting players' existing DLC libraries.
results.name: Rock Band 4

results.deck: The third installment in the mainline Danganronpa series.
results.name: New Danganronpa V3: Minna no Koroshiai Shingakki

results.deck: A remastered release of Dark Souls II, featuring a graphical upgrade, increased online player limit, remixed locations for items and enemies, and includes all of the previously released DLC.
results.name: Dark Souls II: Scholar of the First Sin

results.deck: A 2D action platformer from GameFreak.
results.name: Tembo the Badass Elephant

results.deck: Throw bombs at pigs in this cross between hot potato and dodgeball.
results.name: Butasan

results.deck: Titanfall 2 is planned for release on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.
results.name: Titanfall 2

results.deck: fault -milestone one- is a kinetic novel developed by ALICE IN DISSONANCE.
results.name: fault -milestone one-

results.deck: Yooka-Laylee is a spiritual successor to classic 3D platformers, such as Banjo Kazooie, from former RARE developers at Playtonic Games. Playtonic crowdsourced the game's funding through Kickstarter, achieving their goal within 40 minutes.
results.name: Yooka-Laylee

results.deck: An upgraded version of Guacamelee!: Gold Edition, complete with all of the DLC, and new levels and abilities exclusive to this version. Known as the definitive version of Guacamelee
results.name: Guacamelee!: Super Turbo Championship Edition

results.deck: A 3D twin stick shooter where Yorbie the robot must take on the forces of the evil Dr. Zox.

results.deck: The 2015 edition of the official Grand Prix motorcycle racing game.

results.deck: This is the 2015 edition of the F1 racing game by Codemasters for current generation consoles and PC.

results.name: Assassin’s Creed Chronicles: Russia

results.deck: A 2.5D downloadable title for the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC. The game follows Shao Jun, the last remaining Assassin of the Chinese Brotherhood.

results.deck: Dragon Quest hack-and-slash action returns for a second outing.
